channel.title: Blogs on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari

item.title: Building a Personal Ad-Blocking Server in the Cloud!
item.description: A personal blog post on the motivation and journey behind building a private, ad-blocking DNS server on AWS. Learn why I tackled this project and how it led to a faster, cleaner internet.

item.title: Running a Powerful AI Locally with Docker!
item.description: Curious about running a powerful AI on your own machine? This post introduces my project guide for setting up the DeepSeek-R1 model locally using Docker for ultimate privacy and control.

item.title: My First Cloud Ad-Blocker - A Look Back at AdGuard Home on Linode
item.description: A look back at my first cloud ad-blocking project. This post reflects on setting up AdGuard Home on Linodeâ€”a perfect starting point for anyone new to self-hosting and network privacy.
